name: C
details: C is one of my favorite languages to work with. I first learned the language in 2022 for one of my courses. Some programs I've developed with the language are:

name: Python
details: Python is the first language I learned, back in 2021. I learned it in an introductory CS course which I took to fill out my schedule. I very quickly fell in love with the language and programming in general and switched my degree to a Double Major in Computing Science and Physics. I've made numerous and varied projects in Python, from developing simple games (like Pong) to analyzing data for physics labs.

name: Java
details: I learned Java while developing an Andriod app for one of my classes.

name: JavaScript
details: I learned JavaScript on my own time in order to develop websites (including this one!)

name: TypeScript
details: Much like JS, I learned TypeScript on my own time speciffically to develop this website.

name: Matlab
details: I learned Matlab for one of my courses focused on Numerical Methods. With it, I made image processing software, implemented matrix factoring algorithms, and implemented the logic for calculating a robot arm's joint angles.

name: RISC-V ASM
details: I learned RISC-V Assembly for one of my courses focused on Computer Systems and Architecture. I quickly fell in love with programming and thinking on such a low level. For the course I developed a string search program, a branch instruction fixing program, Conways game of life, and an RISC-V to ARM instruction translator.
